# [Interview #1122: Central Library, Seattle, WA, Entry #10](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1122#10)

#### WeiryWriter

Are you going to write a sequel to Sixth of the Dusk?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Iâ€™m not planning to write a sequel to it, though you may see people from that world, or even Sixth himself, in other books if you keep your eyes open.
